Get Google Folder Contents IDs

Source: R/gs_folder_df.R
gs_folder_df.Rd

Get Google Folder Contents IDs

gs_folder_df(id, slides_only = FALSE)

Arguments

id

Folder id passed to drive_ls after passing through as_id
slides_only

Return only elements that are presentations

Value

A data.frame of the identifiers and properties of the objects

Examples

if (FALSE) {
folder_id = "1GCBE9EAgY3-i1bq9UYf5ec5s9X5TOwEK"
df = gs_folder_df(folder_id)
}
